scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm start:provider" "sleep 2 && pnpm start:client" "sleep 3 && pnpm start:resource"
scripts.start:provider: pnpm --filter identity-provider run build && pnpm --filter identity-provider run start
scripts.start:client: pnpm --filter client-app run build && pnpm --filter client-app run start
scripts.start:resource: pnpm --filter resource-server run build && pnpm --filter resource-server run start
